profile_positions.description:
Primary Responsibilities for role:
•	Create new vendors and make changes/updates to existing vendors in accordance with the company policy
•	Interfaces with online request tool and internal customers to ensure that vendor/supplier requirements are properly setup within SAP
•	Assist with the maintenance of internal Standard Operating Procedures (SOP's) as they relate to Vendor Master duties
•	Assist in the ongoing maintenance and targeted maintenance of Vendor Master data to ensure compliance with company policy
•	Conforms to specified SLA for specific master data item
•	Serve as a resource to peers and internal customers for assistance in resolving SAP related issues
•	Provide excellent customer service, communication, decision making and support to all internal customers at all levels
•	Provide SAP data queries as needed to internal customers for decision making purposes or audit responses
•	Perform ad-hoc project requests and additional duties when assigned
•	Performs duties and responsibilities as described in the quality system
•	Performs other duties as assigned by Manager or Supervisor in support of departmental goals
profile_positions.title: Global Vendor Coding master data -SAM

profile_positions.description:
Maintain and execute system transactions related to accounts payable, including freight payables, vendor coding, and more.
• Assist in the development and maintenance of disbursements process standards and procedures within accounts payable
• Support reporting and analytics necessary for accounts payable monthly, quarterly, and yearly closing activities
• Execute complex daily transactions as part of the accounts payable work process
• Performs activities such as the timely payment of all vendor invoices and expense vouchers, receiving and posting cash receipts, reconciling outstanding account balances, supervising the collections process, and the maintenance of accurate records and control reports
Serve as the direct interface between Category Procurement Managers, Business/functional clients, and suppliers
• Assist stakeholders with issue resolution related to accounts payable activities
• Act as a technical and systems expert within each person’s area of specialization
• Serve as a systems focal point for workflow and technical questions and support
Assist in resolving barriers that may prevent invoices from being paid on time
Support corporate compliance and audits
• Provide accounts payable related support during various internal and external audits
• Review work processes to ensure full compliance with company ethics and due diligence
profile_positions.title: Accounts Payable process-SME

profile_positions.description:
Performing near due and past due collection activities

Managing orders that are being held on credit block

Applying payments and performing off sets

Resolving customer short payments

Creating sales adjustments

Investigating and resolving discrepancies on customer accounts

Additional transactional activities, including but not limited to tax certificate updates, web portal review, document retrieval, and customer contact information updates

profile_positions.description:
⇨ Primary contact for employee(s) during the initial transfer process and length of the international assignment
⇨ Provide overview of International Transfer Policies and Processes with employees
⇨ Counsel with hiring managers on policy/process interpretation
⇨ Consult with Managers and Business/Function Service Leaders on appropriate options to consider for international moves
⇨ Oversee deliverables to employee during the process
⇨ Manage and resolve exceptions to the process or policy with the Global Relocation Director
⇨ Immigration focal point for responsible areas
⇨ Utilize the Human Resource Case Management Tool to update out of the policy/process issues and questions, document exceptions, and track GRS measurements.
⇨ Ability to review vendor management information systems for client status
⇨ Responsible for multiple country activity coordination and ownership of global work process or global vendor relationship or responsible for large geographic coordination
